Subjects release clinic least 10 day since dose soon follow condition meet : - great 90 % administer radioactivity recover , - le 1 % administer radioactive dose recover two consecutive 24-hour sample urine feces
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Subjects must meet criterion include study , include limited following : 1 . Healthy male 18 55 year , inclusive , time informed consent 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 Screening 3 . Subjects must successful vasectomy ( confirm azoospermia ) female partner childbearing potential must practice highly effective contraception throughout study period 30 day study drug discontinuation . Sperm donation allow study period 30 day study drug discontinuation . 4 . Provide write informed consent 5 . Willing able comply aspect protocol Exclusion Criteria Subjects meet follow criterion exclude study : 1 . Have participate 14Cresearch study within 6 month prior Day 2 . The total exposure previous study must within recommend level consider safe . 2 . Exposure clinically significant radiation within 12 month prior Day 2 . 3 . Any laboratory abnormality consider clinically significant investigator , may require investigation treatment 4 . Clinically significant illness require medical treatment within 8 week clinically significant infection within 4 week dose 5 . Any history gastrointestinal surgery ( e.g. , hepatectomy , nephrotomy , digestive organ resection ) may affect PK profile study drug 6 . Hypersensitivity study drug excipients 7 . Known human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) positive Restrictions apply prior concomitant medication , food beverage
